long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will notify you passively when you have the same page open in multiple tabs. You will be given info about which pages are the same and the option to close the current tab and go to the duplicate. You will also be given the option to set up a rule so that in the future that behavior is automatic for certain sites.
